legal_basis: Veterans Review and Appeal Board Act
evidence_assessment: uncontradicted evidence must be accepted unless found incredible
medical reports linking his neck condition to a 1983-1984 fall
contradictory discharge paperwork denying injury claims
decision_reasoning: properly weighed evidence and resolved doubts against granting the pension due to insufficient causal linkage proof
procedure_followed: Judicial review assessed whether the Board erred in fact or law when denying the pension application
result_of_case: Application for judicial review dismissed; pension denial maintained
